Title: Illuminated Titlepiece and Medallion
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This page from Walters manuscript W.589 has an illuminated titlepiece in the upper panel and an authorship statement in the central medallion.
Keywords: Arabic; Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Headpiece; Illumination; Manuscript; Turkey; History; Science; Mineralogy
Provenance: Grand Vizier 'Ali Pasha (?) [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [erased waqf seal with shelf mark 1830 or 8830 on fol. 1a]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Jamal al-Din al-Tifashi
